simulation results: Based on simulations, out of 10 games, BOS won 7 while CGY won 3.
explanation: Boston Bruins (BOS) have shown a stronger performance, particularly at home, with 16 wins compared to 4 losses. They have scored 40 goals in the past 10 games, which is higher than Calgary Flames' (CGY) 31 goals. The Bruins are also on a winning streak, which could contribute to their momentum. Moreover, their record on the year far outperforms Calgary's signifying a better overall form. That said, hockey games can be unpredictable - thus a medium confidence rating.

simulation results: Based on simulations, out of 10 games, DAL won 6 while BUF won 4.
explanation: While Buffalo Sabres (BUF) have a decent home record recently having won 6 out of the last 10 games, the Dallas Stars (DAL) have a stronger away record with 7 of their last 10 games on the road being victories. The Stars have also outscored the Sabres with 41 goals in the last 10 games, compared to the Sabres' 29. The overall performance of the Stars for the season is also notably better than that of the Sabres both in terms of wins and goal differentials. However, given the unpredictable nature of ice hockey games, a medium confidence rating is assigned.

simulation results: Based on simulations, out of 10 games, VAN won 6 while CAR won 4.
explanation: The game appears to be quite closely matched, with both teams displaying good form - Carolina Hurricanes (CAR) has 7 wins in their last 10 games and the Vancouver Canucks (VAN) possess a current winning streak of 8 games. VAN, however, has regularly been scoring more goals in the last 10 games and throughout the season, with a higher overall win record as well. Despite CAR having home advantage, VAN's current form appears to be stronger. But due to the close competitiveness of these teams, the prediction calls for a medium confidence rating.

simulation results: Based on simulations, out of 10 games, FLA won 7 while PHI won 3.
explanation: The Florida Panthers (FLA) seem to have an edge in this matchup. They have won 6 of their last 10 games, a stronger performance compared to the Philadelphia Flyers (PHI), who have only won half of their last ten. Moreover, FLA is currently on a winning streak, while PHI is in a losing streak, which suggests FLA has better momentum. That said, the Flyers' numbers are decent, and the unpredictability of the sport means that this prediction is given a medium confidence rating.

simulation results: Based on simulations, out of 10 games, WPG won 6 while PIT won 4.
explanation: The Winnipeg Jets (WPG) have demonstrated superior form over the Pittsburgh Penguins (PIT). WPG has a better goal differential, have scored considerably less goals against and have a better record for the year. Even though WPG is on a losing streak, they have won 6/10 of their last games which is higher than PIT's 4/10. WPG also has a better track record on the road as compared to PIT's record at home. However, home ice advantage could be a factor for PIT and hence a medium confidence rating is assigned.

simulation results: Based on simulations, out of 10 games, WSH won 6 while MTL won 4.
explanation: While both the Washington Capitals (WSH) and Montreal Canadiens (MTL) have been struggling recently, WSH seems to be in a slightly better position. They've won one more game in their last ten, and have a better home record compared to MTL's away record. Furthermore, WSH has a slightly better overall season record and goal differential in the recent games and the season. However, as ice hockey is a highly unpredictable sport, the prediction is given a medium confidence rating.

simulation results: Based on simulations, out of 10 games, COL won 7 while NJD won 3.
explanation: Colorado Avalanche (COL) has displayed stronger form than New Jersey Devils (NJD) recently, with 7 wins in their last 10 games compared to NJD’s 3. Still, due to COL’s better performance in most aspects, this prediction is made with medium confidence.

simulation results: Based on simulations, out of 10 games, EDM won 6 while VGK won 4.
explanation: Edmonton Oilers (EDM) are on an impressive winning streak, having won all of their last 10 games compared to Vegas Golden Knights' (VGK) 6. Furthermore, EDM's defense has been better as they've allowed fewer goals in their last 10 games compared to VGK. Even though VGK will be playing at home where they have a strong record, EDM's current form suggests they have the upper hand.
